trans-unit.source: Represents an SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a database.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en SQL-setningen eller lagret prosedyre skal kjøres mot en database.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Denne typen er avskrevet og vil bli fjernet i en fremtidig versjon av .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Oracle og ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OracleCommand class provides the following methods for executing commands against a data source: |Item|Description| |----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>|Executes commands that return rows.| |<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteOracleNonQuery%2A>|Executes an SQL statement against the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A> and returns the number of rows affected.| |<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>|Executes commands such as SQL INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE, and SET statements.| |<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar%2A>|Retrieves a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database as a .NET Framework data type.| |<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteOracleScalar%2A>|Retrieves a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database as an Oracle-specific data type.| You can reset the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> property and reuse the OracleCommand object.
trans-unit.target: Klassen OracleCommand inneholder følgende metoder for å utføre kommandoer mot en datakilde: | Elementet | Beskrivelse | |----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>| Utfører kommandoer som returnerer radene. | | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteOracleNonQuery%2A>| Utfører en SQL-setning mot <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>og returnerer antall rader som er berørt. | | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>| Utfører kommandoer som SQL-INNSETTING, Oppdater og Slett Sett-setninger. | | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar%2A>| Henter en enkelt verdi (for eksempel en aggregatfunksjon verdi) fra en database som en .NET Framework-datatype. | | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteOracleScalar%2A>| Henter en enkelt verdi (for eksempel en aggregatfunksjon verdi) fra en database som en Oracle-spesifikke datatype. | Du kan tilbakestille den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>egenskapen og gjenbruk OracleCommand-objektet.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteOracleScalar%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteOracleNonQuery%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: If execution of the command results in a fatal <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleException>, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> may close.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kjøring av kommandoen resulterer i en kritisk <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleException>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>kan avsluttes.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleException>

trans-unit.source: However, the user can reopen the connection and continue.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan imidlertid åpne tilkoblingen, og fortsette.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Unlike the **Command** object in the other .NET Framework data providers (SQL Server, OLE DB, and ODBC), the OracleCommand object does not support a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I motsetning til det **kommandoen** objekt i andre .NET Framework dataleverandørene (SQL Server, OLE DB og ODBC) OracleCommand objektet ikke støtter en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting a command timeout has no effect and the value returned is always zero.
trans-unit.target: Angir tidsavbruddet for kommando har ingen virkning, og den returnerte verdien er alltid null.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The base constructor initializes all fields to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Grunnleggende konstruktøren initialiserer alle felt til standardverdiene.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: |Properties|Initial Value| |----------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>|empty string ("")| |<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>|`Text`| |<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>|null|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskaper | Standardverdi | |----------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>| tom streng ("") | | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>| `Text`| | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>|null|</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> class with the text of the query.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> klasse teksten i spørringen.

trans-unit.source: The text of the query.
trans-unit.target: Teksten i spørringen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> class with the text of the query and an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> klasse teksten i spørringen, og en <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The text of the query.
trans-unit.target: Teksten i spørringen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"></xref> object that represents the connection to a database.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"> </xref> objektet som representerer tilkobling til en database.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> class with the text of the query, an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"></xref> object, and an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> klasse teksten i spørringen, en <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"> </xref> objekt, og en <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of this implementation of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av denne implementeringen av <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: |Properties|Initial Value| |----------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>|`cmdText`| |<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>|`Text`| |<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>|A new <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> that is the value for the `connection` parameter.| You can change the value for any of these parameters by setting the related property.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskaper | Standardverdi | |----------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>| `cmdText`| | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>| `Text`| | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>| En ny <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>som er verdien for den `connection` parameteren. | Du kan endre verdien for noen av disse parameterne ved å angi egenskapen relaterte.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text of the query.
trans-unit.target: Teksten i spørringen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"></xref> object that represents the connection to a database.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"> </xref> objektet som representerer tilkobling til en database.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction"></xref> in which the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction"> </xref> der den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> utfører.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to cancel the execution of an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å avbryte kjøringen av en <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If there is nothing to cancel, nothing happens.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingenting å avbryte, skjer ikke noe.

trans-unit.source: However, if there is a command in process, and the attempt to cancel fails, no exception is generated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det pågår en kommando, og forsøk på å avbryte mislykkes, genereres imidlertid ingen unntak.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kopi av denne <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object in which all property values are the same as the original.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> objektet i som alle egenskap verdiene er de samme som opprinnelige.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against the database.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir SQL-setningen eller lagret prosedyre skal kjøres mot databasen.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A> property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the CommandText property should be set to the name of the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>er satt til `StoredProcedure`, CommandText-egenskapen må være satt til navnet på den lagrede prosedyren.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user may be required to use escape character syntax if the stored procedure name contains any special characters.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan være nødvendig å bruke tegnet avbrytningssyntaks Hvis det lagrede prosedyrenavnet inneholder noen spesialtegn.

trans-unit.source: The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods.
trans-unit.target: Utfører denne lagrede prosedyren når du kaller én av metodene Execute.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to an SQL statement called by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> of `CommandType.Text`.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework-dataleverandør for Oracle støtter ikke spørsmål merke (?)-plassholder for sending av parameterne til en SQL-setning kalles av en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>av `CommandType.Text`.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: In this case, named parameters must be used.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet må parametere med navn brukes.

trans-unit.source: For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = :pCustomerID ``` When using named parameters in an SQL statement called by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> of `CommandType.Text`, you must precede the parameter name with a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: For eksempel: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = :pCustomerID ``` når ved hjelp av parametere med navn i en SQL-setning kalles av en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>av `CommandType.Text`, må du angi før parameternavnet med et kolon (:).</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: However, in a stored procedure, or when referring to a named parameter elsewhere in your code (for example, when adding <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> objects to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters%2A> property), do not precede the named parameter with a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: I en lagret prosedyre eller refererer til en navngitt parameter sted i koden (for eksempel når du legger til <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>objekter til den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters%2A>egenskapen), ikke komme foran den navngitte parameteren med et kolon (:).</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle supplies the colon automatically.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework-dataleverandør for Oracle leverer kolon automatisk.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statement or stored procedure to execute.
trans-unit.target: SQL-setningen eller lagret prosedyre til å kjøre.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the wait time before terminating the attempt to execute a command and generating an error.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir ventetiden før forsøket å utføre en kommando og det genereres en feil.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ArgumentException> is generated if the assigned CommandTimeout property value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ArgumentException>genereres hvis den tilordnede CommandTimeout-verdien for egenskapen er mindre enn 0.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The time (in seconds) to wait for the command to execute.
trans-unit.target: Tiden (i sekunder) skal vente på kommandoen som skal kjøres.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 30 sekunder.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText*> property is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hvordan <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText*>egenskapen tolkes.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText*>

trans-unit.source: When the CommandType property is set to `StoredProcedure`, you should set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> property to the full Oracle call syntax.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen CommandType er satt til `StoredProcedure`, bør du sette den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>egenskapen fullstendig Oracle kallsyntaksen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The command then executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods (for example, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Deretter utfører denne lagrede prosedyren når du kaller en av Execute-metoder (for eksempel <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>eller <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>).</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>, CommandType and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> properties cannot be set if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>, CommandType og <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>Egenskaper kan ikke angis hvis den gjeldende tilkoblingen utfører en execute- eller fetch-operasjonen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to an SQL statement called by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> of `CommandType.Text`.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework-dataleverandør for Oracle støtter ikke spørsmål merke (?)-plassholder for sending av parameterne til en SQL-setning kalles av en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>av `CommandType.Text`.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: In this case, named parameters must be used.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet må parametere med navn brukes.

trans-unit.source: For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = :pCustomerID ``` When using named parameters in an SQL statement called by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> of `CommandType.Text`, you must precede the parameter name with a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: For eksempel: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = :pCustomerID ``` når ved hjelp av parametere med navn i en SQL-setning kalles av en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>av `CommandType.Text`, må du angi før parameternavnet med et kolon (:).</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: However, in a stored procedure, or when referring to a named parameter elsewhere in your code (for example, when adding <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> objects to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters%2A> property), do not precede the named parameter with a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: I en lagret prosedyre eller refererer til en navngitt parameter sted i koden (for eksempel når du legger til <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>objekter til den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters%2A>egenskapen), ikke komme foran den navngitte parameteren med et kolon (:).</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle supplies the colon automatically.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework-dataleverandør for Oracle leverer kolon automatisk.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Text" name="Text" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_Text" name="Text" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value was not a valid <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er ikke en gyldig <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"></xref> used by this instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"> </xref> brukes i denne forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You cannot set the Connection, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> properties if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke angi tilkoblingen <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>, og <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>Egenskaper hvis den gjeldende tilkoblingen utfører en execute- eller fetch-operasjonen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set Connection while a transaction is in progress and the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A> property is not null, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is generated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir tilkoblingen mens en transaksjon pågår og <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A>egenskapen er null, en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>genereres.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set Connection after the transaction has been committed or rolled back, and the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A> property is not null, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A> property is then set to a null value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir tilkobling etter at transaksjonen er iverksatt eller rullet tilbake, og <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A>egenskapen er null, i <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A>deretter settes til en nullverdi.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The connection to a data source.
trans-unit.target: Tilkobling til en datakilde.

trans-unit.source: The default is a null value.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en nullverdi.

trans-unit.source: The Connection property was changed while a transaction was in progress.
trans-unit.target: Connection-egenskapen ble endret under en transaksjon pågår.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av en <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The CreateParameter method is a strongly-typed version of <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.CreateParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateParameter er en strongly-typed-versjon av <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.CreateParameter%2A>.</xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.CreateParameter%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the command object should be visible in a customized interface control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om det skal være synlig i en tilpasset Grensesnittkontrollen command-objektet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the command object should be visible in a control; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, hvis command-objektet som skal vises i kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Executes an SQL statement against the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection*> and returns the number of rows affected.
trans-unit.target: Utfører en SQL-setning mot den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection*>og returnerer antall rader som er berørt.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection*>

trans-unit.source: You can use ExecuteNonQuery to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables); or to change the data in a database, without using a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke ExecuteNonQuery til å utføre operasjoner katalogen (for eksempel spørring strukturen i en database eller oppretting av databaseobjekter som tabeller); eller endre data i en database uten å bruke en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, ved kjøring INSERT-, UPDATE eller DELETE-setninger.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Although ExecuteNonQuery does not return any rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data.
trans-unit.target: Selv om ExecuteNonQuery ikke returnerer alle rader, noen utdataparametere eller returverdier som er tilordnet til parametere er fylt ut med data.

trans-unit.source: For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command.
trans-unit.target: For UPDATE-, INSERT- og DELETE-setninger er returverdien hvor mange rader som er berørt av kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: For CREATE TABLE and DROP TABLE statements, the return value is 0.
trans-unit.target: For opprette og slette TABELLEN setninger er returverdien 0.

trans-unit.source: For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.
trans-unit.target: For alle andre typer setninger er returverdien -1.

trans-unit.source: If a rollback occurs, the return value is also -1.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår en tilbakerulling, er også verdien som returneres-1.

trans-unit.source: For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command.
trans-unit.target: For UPDATE-, INSERT- og DELETE-setninger er returverdien hvor mange rader som er berørt av kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: For CREATE TABLE and DROP TABLE statements, the return value is 0.
trans-unit.target: For opprette og slette TABELLEN setninger er returverdien 0.

trans-unit.source: For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.
trans-unit.target: For alle andre typer setninger er returverdien -1.

trans-unit.source: The connection does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingen finnes ikke.

trans-unit.source: -or- The connection is not open.
trans-unit.target: - eller - tilkoblingen er åpen.

trans-unit.source: Executes an SQL statement against the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection*> and returns the number of rows affected.
trans-unit.target: Utfører en SQL-setning mot den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection*>og returnerer antall rader som er berørt.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection*>

trans-unit.source: You can use ExecuteOracleNonQuery to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables); or to change the data in a database, without using a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke ExecuteOracleNonQuery til å utføre operasjoner katalogen (for eksempel spørring strukturen i en database eller oppretting av databaseobjekter som tabeller); eller endre data i en database uten å bruke en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, ved kjøring INSERT-, UPDATE eller DELETE-setninger.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: ExecuteOracleNonQuery differs from <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A> in that it returns `rowid` as an output parameter if you are executing an INSERT, DELETE, or UPDATE statement that affects exactly one row.
trans-unit.target: ExecuteOracleNonQuery er forskjellig fra <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>ved at den returnerer `rowid` som en utdataparameter Hvis du kjører en INSERT-, DELETE eller UPDATE-setning som påvirker nøyaktig én rad.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to uniquely identify a row in the Oracle database, which can allow you to increase performance in subsequent, related queries.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg til å identifisere en rad i Oracle-database, som tillater deg å øke ytelse i etterfølgende, relaterte spørringer.

trans-unit.source: Although ExecuteOracleNonQuery does not return any rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data.
trans-unit.target: Selv om ExecuteOracleNonQuery ikke returnerer alle rader, noen utdataparametere eller returverdier som er tilordnet til parametere er fylt ut med data.

trans-unit.source: A base64 string representation of the actual row ID in the server.
trans-unit.target: En base64-strengrepresentasjon av faktiske rad-ID på serveren.

trans-unit.source: For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command.
trans-unit.target: For UPDATE-, INSERT- og DELETE-setninger er returverdien hvor mange rader som er berørt av kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: For CREATE TABLE and DROP TABLE statements, the return value is 0.
trans-unit.target: For opprette og slette TABELLEN setninger er returverdien 0.

trans-unit.source: For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.
trans-unit.target: For alle andre typer setninger er returverdien -1.

trans-unit.source: The connection does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingen finnes ikke.

trans-unit.source: -or- The connection is not open.
trans-unit.target: - eller - tilkoblingen er åpen.

trans-unit.source: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query as an Oracle-specific data type.
trans-unit.target: Kjører spørringen, og returnerer den første kolonnen i den første raden i resultatsettet som returneres av spørringen som en Oracle-spesifikke datatype.

trans-unit.source: Extra columns or rows are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Ekstra kolonner eller rader ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: Use the ExecuteOracleScalar method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ExecuteOracleScalar-metoden til å hente en enkelt verdi (for eksempel en aggregatfunksjon verdi) fra en database.

trans-unit.source: This requires less code than using the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> method, and then performing the operations necessary to generate the single value from the data returned by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>.
trans-unit.target: Dette krever mindre kode enn å bruke <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>metoden, og deretter utføre operasjoner som er nødvendig for å generere enkeltverdi fra dataene som returneres av en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: A typical ExecuteOracleScalar query can be formatted as in the following C# example: ``` command.CommandText = "SELECT COUNT(*) AS NumberOfRegions FROM Region"; count = command.ExecuteOracleScalar(); ```
trans-unit.target: En vanlig ExecuteOracleScalar-spørring kan formatere eksemplet nedenfor C#:``` command.CommandText = "SELECT COUNT(*) AS NumberOfRegions FROM Region"; count = command.ExecuteOracleScalar(); ```

trans-unit.source: The first column of the first row in the result set as an Oracle-specific data type, or a null reference if the result is a <xref uid="langword_csharp_REF CURSOR" name="REF CURSOR" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den første kolonnen i den første raden i resultatet angis som en Oracle-spesifikke datatype eller en nullreferanse Hvis resultatet er en <xref uid="langword_csharp_REF CURSOR" name="REF CURSOR" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sends the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText*> to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection*> and builds an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sender den <> </> *> til den <> </> *> og bygger en <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A> property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> property should be set to the name of the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>er satt til `StoredProcedure`, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>egenskapen må være satt til navnet på den lagrede prosedyren.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The command then executes this stored procedure when you call ExecuteReader.
trans-unit.target: Deretter utfører denne lagrede prosedyren når du kaller ExecuteReader.

trans-unit.source: More than one <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> can be open at any given time.
trans-unit.target: Mer enn én <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>kan være åpen om gangen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Sends the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText*> to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection*>, and builds an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"></xref> using one of the <xref href="System.Data.CommandBehavior"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Sender den <> </> *> til den <> </> *>, og bygger en <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"> </xref> ved hjelp av en av de <xref href="System.Data.CommandBehavior"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: If you expect your SQL statement to return only a single row, specifying `SingleRow` as the <xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior> value may improve application performance.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du forventer SQL-setningen til å returnere bare én rad, ved å angi `SingleRow` som den <xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior>verdi kan forbedre ytelsen.</xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A> property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> property should be set to the name of the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>er satt til `StoredProcedure`, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>egenskapen må være satt til navnet på den lagrede prosedyren.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The command then executes this stored procedure when you call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Deretter utfører denne lagrede prosedyren når du kaller <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> supports a special mode that enables large binary values to be read efficiently.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>støtter en spesiell modus som aktiverer store binære verdier leses effektivt.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for <xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den `SequentialAccess` innstillingen for <xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior>.</xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior>

trans-unit.source: More than one <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> can be open at any given time.
trans-unit.target: Mer enn én <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>kan være åpen om gangen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.CommandBehavior"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.CommandBehavior"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query as a .NET Framework data type.
trans-unit.target: Kjører spørringen, og returnerer den første kolonnen i den første raden i resultatsettet som returneres av spørringen som en .NET Framework-datatype.

trans-unit.source: Extra columns or rows are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Ekstra kolonner eller rader ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: Use the ExecuteScalar method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ExecuteScalar-metoden til å hente en enkelt verdi (for eksempel en aggregatfunksjon verdi) fra en database.

trans-unit.source: This requires less code than using the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> method, and then performing the operations necessary to generate the single value from the data returned by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>.
trans-unit.target: Dette krever mindre kode enn å bruke <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>metoden, og deretter utføre operasjoner som er nødvendig for å generere enkeltverdi fra dataene som returneres av en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: A typical ExecuteScalar query can be formatted as in the following C# example: ``` CommandText = "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Region"; Int32 count = (int32) ExecuteScalar(); ```
trans-unit.target: En vanlig ExecuteScalar-spørring kan formatere eksemplet nedenfor C#:``` CommandText = "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Region"; Int32 count = (int32) ExecuteScalar(); ```

trans-unit.source: The first column of the first row in the result set as a .NET Framework data type, or a null reference if the result set is empty or the result is a <xref uid="langword_csharp_REF CURSOR" name="REF CURSOR" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den første kolonnen i den første raden i resultatet angitt som en .NET Framework-datatype, eller en nullreferanse Hvis resultatsettet er tom, eller resultatet er en <xref uid="langword_csharp_REF CURSOR" name="REF CURSOR" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A> property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> property should be set to the name of the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>er satt til `StoredProcedure`, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>egenskapen må være satt til navnet på den lagrede prosedyren.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user may be required to use escape character syntax if the stored procedure name contains any special characters.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan være nødvendig å bruke tegnet avbrytningssyntaks Hvis det lagrede prosedyrenavnet inneholder noen spesialtegn.

trans-unit.source: The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods.
trans-unit.target: Utfører denne lagrede prosedyren når du kaller én av metodene Execute.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to an SQL statement called by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> of `CommandType.Text`.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework-dataleverandør for Oracle støtter ikke spørsmål merke (?)-plassholder for sending av parameterne til en SQL-setning kalles av en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>av `CommandType.Text`.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: In this case, named parameters must be used.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet må parametere med navn brukes.

trans-unit.source: For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = :pCustomerID ``` When using named parameters in an SQL statement called by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> of `CommandType.Text`, you must precede the parameter name with a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: For eksempel: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = :pCustomerID ``` når ved hjelp av parametere med navn i en SQL-setning kalles av en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>av `CommandType.Text`, må du angi før parameternavnet med et kolon (:).</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: However, in a stored procedure, or when referring to a named parameter elsewhere in your code (for example, when adding <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> objects to the Parameters property), do not precede the named parameter with a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: I en lagret prosedyre eller refererer til en navngitt parameter sted i koden (for eksempel når du legger til <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>objekter i egenskapen Parameters), ikke komme foran den navngitte parameteren med et kolon (:).</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle supplies the colon automatically.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework-dataleverandør for Oracle leverer kolon automatisk.

trans-unit.source: The parameters of the SQL statement or stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: Parameterne for SQL-setningen eller lagret prosedyre.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom samling.

trans-unit.source: Creates a prepared (or compiled) version of the command at the data source.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en klargjort (eller kompilerte) versjonen av kommandoen i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Before you call Prepare, specify the data type of each parameter in the statement to be prepared.
trans-unit.target: Før du kaller Prepare, må du angi datatypen for hver parameter i å være forberedt-setningen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection*> is not set. -or- The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection*> is not <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Open*>.
trans-unit.target: Den <> </> *> er ikke angitt. -or- The <>*> is not <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Open*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Open*>

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandTimeout*> property to the default value.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller det <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandTimeout*>egenskapen til standardverdien.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandTimeout*>

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> is 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>er 30 sekunder.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction"></xref> within which the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction"> </xref> som den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> utfører.

trans-unit.source: You cannot set the Transaction property if it is already set to a specific value, and the command is in the process of executing.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke angi egenskapen Transaction hvis den allerede er satt til en bestemt verdi, og kommandoen er i ferd med å kjøres.

trans-unit.source: If you set the transaction property to an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction> object that is not connected to the same <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> as the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object, an exception will be thrown the next time you attempt to execute a statement.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter transaction-egenskapen til en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction>objekt som ikke er koblet til samme <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>som den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objektet, vil bli utløst et unntak neste gang du forsøker å utføre en setning.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is a null value.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en nullverdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Update" name="Update" href=""></xref> method should apply command results to the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hvordan <xref uid="langword_csharp_Update" name="Update" href=""> </xref> metoden skal bruke kommandoen resultatene til den <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Data.UpdateRowSource> value is `Both` unless the command is automatically generated (as in the case of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>), in which case the default is `None`.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Data.UpdateRowSource>verdien er `Both` Hvis kommandoen genereres automatisk (som med den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>), og da standarden er `None`.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.UpdateRowSource>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the <xref:System.Data.UpdateRowSource> property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker den <xref:System.Data.UpdateRowSource>egenskapen se [DataAdapter parametere](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Data.UpdateRowSource>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateRowSource"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.UpdateRowSource"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The value entered was not one of the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateRowSource"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke en av de <xref href="System.Data.UpdateRowSource"> </xref> verdier.
